item.description: Please join me this Saturday at 8:00 AM at Panera Bread at Arsenal on the Charles for a 15 mile run. This is going to be a leisurely run. I hope to maintain a 9 1/2 minute mile pace, but I cannot guarantee that there won't be some stopping and walking (and possibly crying). Since we're looking at a minimum of two hours out there, I strongly suggest that those who choose to run with me arrive fully hydrated, covered in sunscreen, and armed with "gu" packs (word of warning: steer clear of vanilla; chocolate is tolerable). I hope to see you there. If I haven't received any "yes" replies by Friday evening, I will cancel the meetup, and run my 15 miles closer to home.

group.name: Boston Informal Running Club: Home of TMIRCE:BOS

item.name: Saturday Morning 15 Mile Run Along the Charles
